rows.label: qev040102_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is time to be brave, Walolo! New and happy life
of Lana and Walolo is just at very beginning.
Lana not let that end here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0002
rows.name: ...Er, hello. Is friend here to speak with Lana?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that Bubu sent you.

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0020
rows.name: Verify

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lana what the situation is.

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0003
rows.name:
Bubu sent friend all this way just to find Lana?
Sometimes that Nopon so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ugh! Never be minding! Now is not time to worry
about Bubu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Friend must get rid of monoceroses up there.
Then Lana will answer all snoopy questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0006
rows.name:
Lana was headed for Drongo Caravan when
monoceroses attacked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0007
rows.name:
Lana and Walolo took shelter here, but nasty, evil
monoceroses still waiting for us up there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Friends must get rid of them. Then Lana will answer all
snoopy questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0009
rows.name:
Walolo too afraid to move, so friend must hurry and
clear out nasty monoceroses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0018
rows.name:
...What? Monoceroses already gone?
Friend works quickly! Lana is impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0019
rows.name:
Come to Drongo Caravan, friend.
Lana explain everything there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0022
rows.name: Thanks for helping Lana before, friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0023
rows.name:
And though brave friend saved precious life of Lana,
Lana still not going back to Bubu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0024
rows.name:
Lana staying here with Walolo! Lana LOVE Walolo!
Do not drag poor Lana away and tear fluffy heart
into pieces![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0051
rows.name: Accept that this is what Lana truly wants.

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Lana that she can't betray Bubu like that.

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0025
rows.name:
Yay! Friend is so understanding! So kind!
Now Lana can start better life here with Walolo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0026
rows.name:
Friend is right... But also wrong! Love of Lana and
Walolo is like unstoppable charge of mighty ovis.
So Lana stay here and start better life with Walolo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Whaaaa?! Lana married to Bubu already?!
Walolo not want anything to do with this mess.
Walolo is not wrecker of homes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oh no! Lana not letting Walolo get away that easy!
Real Nopon takes responsibility for actions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0029
rows.name:
N-no way! Walolo heading back to New LA!
Bye-bye, Lana![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0030
rows.name:
Grrr... Walolo is spineless excuse for Nopon!
Now clever plan of Lana ruined. Unless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh-ho-ho-hooooo! Wait single moment, Walolo!
Lana forget to mention one little tiny thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0032
rows.name: Lana carrying littlepon of Walolo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0033
rows.name:
WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT?!
Walolo going to be d-d-dadapon...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0034
rows.name: Yes! So grow spine and finish what Walolo start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0035
rows.name: Friend agrees with Lana, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that Walolo has a responsibility to his children.

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0080
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0081
rows.name: Stare at Lana with an incredibly skeptical gaze.

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0036
rows.name: See? Nice friend agree. Walolo must stay with Lana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0037
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Friend is bad person to suspect Lana of
tricksery with no proof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0038
rows.name:
Now come, Walolo. No time for arguing.
Littlepon of Lana and Walolo about to be born.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0039
rows.name:
Nrrgrgh... All right. Walolo is nothing if not fine,
upstanding Nopon. Walolo will do right thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0040
rows.name: Yay![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0041
rows.name:
Now, human friend will go and fetch materials needed
to make good luck charm to ensure healthy littlepon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0042
rows.name:
Lana need six malevolent petramand silks and
six golden puffs dropped by local monsters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0043
rows.name:
Littlepon of Lana count on you! ...Er, and Walolo.
Littlepon of Walolo also count on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0044
rows.name:
Materials to make charm are six malevolent petramand
silks and six golden puffs. They can be obtained from
nearby mephites.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0045
rows.name:
...Huh? Bubu? Lana hoping friend will hurry up and
forget about him already. Littlepon of Lana and Walolo
is what matter now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0046
rows.name:
Th-the littlepon is coming! First littlepon of Walolo
almost ready to be born![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0047
rows.name: Does it hurt, Lana? Walolo with you every step of way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0048
rows.name:
Lana not going to make it without good luck charm.
Has friend found materials yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0049
rows.name:
Meh-meh! So perfect! Now friend and Walolo wait.
Lana be right back after miracle of childbirth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0050
rows.name: This part go...here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0051
rows.name: Add eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0052
rows.name: Aaaand...done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0053
rows.name:
Walolo! The littlepon! Beautiful littlepon of Lana and
Walolo has been born![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0054
rows.name: Th-this baby of Walolo...? It so tiny! So CUTE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0090
rows.name: Quip

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0091
rows.name: Mutter loudly about how it's clearly a stuffed animal.

rows.label: qev040102_JNK0100
rows.name: Gape

rows.label: qev040102_SEL0101
rows.name: Tremble at the awe-inspiring sight of life's new dawn.

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0055
rows.name:
Wait... Friend is right! Walolo see sloppy stitching
everywhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0056
rows.name: Friend has big mouth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0057
rows.name: LANA! What is meaning of this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0058
rows.name: Oh, fine! If jig is up, Lana tell you everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0059
rows.name: Lana tired of clingy affection from Bubu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0060
rows.name:
Whenever Lana want to go out, Bubu insist it too
dangerous. Follow Lana around everywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0061
rows.name:
Bubu even blow on every spoonful of soup when Lana
try to eat, because apparently mild burn to tongue is
fatal in world of Bubu. But Lana LIKE hot soup![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0062
rows.name:
It was nightmare. So when Lana see Walolo,
Lana decide to start new life here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0063
rows.name: What? Walolo just pawn in game of Lana?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0064
rows.name: Failed pawn! Lana was so close, too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0065
rows.name:
Hmph. Fine! Lana will go back to New LA.
...Still, Lana enjoyed short time here with Walolo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0066
rows.name:
Friend feels the same as Walolo?
Littlepon are so amazing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0067
rows.name:
Walolo will make new home for us in caravan.
Walolo will make family happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0068
rows.name: Whew![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0069
rows.name:
Friend heard this? Tell Bubu that Lana is happy here.
Also maybe make up something so he feel better.
Say it not Bubu—it Lana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0070
rows.name:
Before Bubu more clingy than old glue,
but recently Bubu distant and prickly. It very...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0071
rows.name:
manly! And hot! Lana happy to be with this version
of Bubu for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0072
rows.name:
Phew! All go according to plan. Lana finally shed off
clingy Bubu and able to live life of freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040102_MSG0073
rows.name:
...Did friend overhear that? Er, it best for everyone if
friend forget everything.[ST:wait ]
